localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: Dave Ramsey is against stimulus checks because ‘if $600 or $1,400 changes your life, you were pretty much screwed already’ https://t.co/x0L4bon8Sh
blogPost.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text: 戴夫-拉姆齐反对经济刺激支票，因为 "如果600美元或1400美元改变了你的生活，你就已经差不多完蛋了 "https://t.co/x0L4bon8Sh。
戴夫-拉姆齊反對經濟刺激支票，因爲 "如果600美元或1400美元改變了你的生活，你就已經差不多完蛋了 "https://t.co/x0L4bon8Sh。

previous.excerpt: Bored of long news articles? Nyus is a news app designed for teenagers. It gives news in the form of memes and makes news fun and engaging. We aggregate our news from the top news sources in India and are rated 4.6 stars on Play Store.
previous.title: Nyus - Get news in the form of memes

localize.description: 厌倦了冗长的新闻文章？Nyus是一款专为青少年设计的新闻应用。它以备忘录的形式给出新闻，让新闻变得有趣和吸引人。我们从印度的顶级新闻来源汇总我们的新闻，并在Play Store上被评为4.6星。
localize.tagline: 以备忘录的形式获取新闻

localize.description: 厭倦了冗長的新聞文章？Nyus是一款專爲青少年設計的新聞應用。它以備忘錄的形式給出新聞，讓新聞變得有趣和吸引人。我們從印度的頂級新聞來源彙總我們的新聞，並在Play Store上被評爲4.6星。
localize.tagline: 以備忘錄的形式獲取新聞
